# Security Instructions

> This is a reference file for GitHub Copilot.
> The authoritative version is maintained at `.ai/standards/security/baseline.md`

## Quick Rules

- **Secrets:** Never commit API keys, tokens, or passwords
- **Input:** Validate and sanitize all user input
- **Auth:** Verify authentication and authorization

## Full Standards

For complete security standards, see:
- **Primary source:** [.ai/standards/security/baseline.md](../../.ai/standards/security/baseline.md)

Apply these standards to all code in this project.

---

**Note:** This file exists for GitHub Copilot compatibility. All updates should be made to `.ai/standards/security/baseline.md` which is the single source of truth.
